dict.acceptation: 有，所有，拥有；领地；财产，所有权，占有物，所有物；持有违禁物；

sent.orig: The essential element is possession, and that possession must be lawful.
sent.trans: （占有留置的）必备要素是占有，且该占有必须合法。

sent.orig: He was caught in possession of stolen goods/with stolen goods in his possession.
The Company has possession over the security of the account individual or jointly.
sent.trans: 公司维护个人的或联名的账户的安全。

sent.orig: The Virago was a prized possession, a heavily modified MandalMoters StarViper built to his exacting specifications.
sent.trans: “泼妇”号是一件珍贵的财产，是一架按照他的严格意愿大大改动了的曼德尔发动机“星际毒蛇”战机。

sent.orig: His mother indulged him in material possession.
sent.trans: 他的母亲纵容他，总是给他买这买那。
